Locke is a password manager designed from the ground up for families. Unlike Netflix, we want you to share passwords (thatâ€™s a thing our app does!).

This browser extension autofills and autosaves your passwords, and has an opt-in continual authentication feature that authenticates you via your typing patterns. If you don't want to use continual authentication, fear not, it's off by default. But if you feel like upgrading your Internet security go ahead and check the box!
